Header.title: Fred Duy Tan Dao
Header.paragraph: I forgot to mention earlier that I also have a BA in Mass Communications from the University of South Carolina so I can also produce videos/photos/graphics on professional scale.

About.paragraph: My name is Fred Duy Tan Dao. I am a full stack web developer that uses HTML, CSS, Javascript, React JS, Java, and SQL in unison to create websites and web applications. I am excited to find a team that will help facilitate my continued growth as a developer by giving me new and exciting challenges to figure out. I believe that I will be able to use background in Communications to establish new development teams or strengthen an existing team.

Services.name: Web
Services.text: In 2019 I launched an e-commerce site via Wordpress that was a spectacular failure. I failed fast and forward. I still plan on revisiting that project in the future.

Services.name: E-Commerce
Services.text: I learned how to use Stripe's API and Paypal's API to take payments for this site quickly. I dedicated so much of my time to this that I forgot to find an audience.

Services.name: Remote Work
Services.text: Along with a lot of other folks, I have slowly but surely learned how to work in a remote environment although I am open to in person interaction.

Services.name: Languages
Services.text: I am billingual, speaking both English and Vietnamese. I am proficient in Spanish and slowly learning German.

Services.name: Logisitics
Services.text: After working at Amazon and learning first hand how one of the top e-commerce companies handles logisitics and software I am confident that I can bring those core compentencies to the table.

Services.name: Critical Analysis
Services.text: I am constantly finding ways to connect the dots between variables and their outcomes. This ideology has fueled many of my interests and past pursuits.

Testimonials.text: "Tesla and SpaceX would not have been possible without Fred having my back in the beginning. Fred is a true genius. Also while I'm here dogecoin to the MOOOOOOOOOON!!!"
Testimonials.name: Elon Musk (Business Magnate)

Testimonials.text: "Fred is one of the best friends that I could possibly ask for. He guided me through some very tough times in my professional and personal life. He is a true leader in my humble opinion."
Testimonials.name: Barrack Obama (Former President)

Testimonials.text: "That young man Fred is quite the funny guy! When I went to Africa he would always stay in touch and made sure that I didn't give up on what I loved. We've even written a few jokes together. It is rare to meet someone so geniunely kind. "
Testimonials.name: Dave Chappelle (Comedian)

Testimonials.text: "The first person I play in order to prepare for my major tournaments would be Fred. He refuses to play chess on a professional level because it would ruin his love of the game but I truly believe that he is observant and calculated enough to beat me in a tournament setting."
Testimonials.name: Magnus Carlsen (Chess GM)

Testimonials.text: "Whenever I get writer's block I always call Fred for a quick chat. Talking to him helps release a lot of mental blocks in my workflow. He always manages to ask the right questions to clear things up for me. His insatiable curiousity is something that I strive to emulate."
Testimonials.name: Malcolm Gladwell (Author)

Testimonials.text: "I always go to Fred to set my mind right before training. He might be new to boxing but whenever he is given a mission he puts every fiber of his being into it and that is something I admire about him."
Testimonials.name: Ryan Garcia (Professional Boxer)

Features.title: Communication
Features.text: Verbal and written communication is the secret sauce to success in an AGILE environment.

Features.title: Project Management
Features.text: Nothing noteworthy has ever been accomplished by just one person. As a leader you are a servant to your goal and your team.

Features.title: Teamwork
Features.text: Committing to a greater goal means to have the team's best interests in mind.

Features.title: Magic of Perspective
Features.text: Humble beginnings yield people that work hard and are grateful for opportunities.
